snippet: Bob Dole's campaign manager said today that Ralph Nader, the nominee of the Green Party, should be considered as a possible participant in any Presidential debates.    Appearing on CNN's ''Evans & Novak'' program, the campaign manager, Scott Reed,...
lead_paragraph: Bob Dole's campaign manager said today that Ralph Nader, the nominee of the Green Party, should be considered as a possible participant in any Presidential debates. Appearing on CNN's ''Evans & Novak'' program, the campaign manager, Scott Reed, said he had written a letter to Peter Knight, the manager of the Clinton campaign, suggesting that they meet next week to discuss the fall debates.
abstract: Bob Dole's campaign manager, Scott Reed, says Ralph Nader, nominee of Green Party, should be considered as possible participant in any Presidential debates; Ross Perot's candidacy is generally viewed as taking votes away from Dole; Nader could possibly draw votes from Clinton in states where Green Party is strong, like California (S)

headline.main: Dole Camp Says Consider Nader for Debate
